r.s: Creates DTA files containing money transaction data (Germany).
r.d: Payment_DTA provides functions to create DTA files used in Germany to exchange informations about money transactions with banks or online banking programs.
r.n: [-] Fixed bug #1387 "Notice on line 195" (with error_reporting set to E_ALL, the class output a notice). Thanks to Markus Wolff! [!] Class functions were tested extended in credit mode. ( [+] Added [-] Fixed [*] Improved [!] Note )
